thread.title: Pictures: Newsies Red Carpet At The Bushnell
thread.title_full: Pictures: Newsies Red Carpet At The Bushnell - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: Pictures: Newsies Red Carpet At The Bushnell
text:
Caption Newsies at the Bushnell Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant See more galleries Caption Newsies at the Bushnell Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant See more galleries Disney's Musical sensation 'Newsies' opened up on Tuesday at the Bushnell Performing Arts Center and fans have been going wild about it ever since. The Hartford Courant set up a cut-out window simulating an issue from the 1800s for people to be photographed as Newsies together on the red carpet area outside the main theatre. Show attendees had an opportunity for photos and fun while waiting for the show to begin.
Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant
